tool_description:
Last update: February 11, 2023.
An API providing a lot of different wisdom quotes.  You will love it!
name: Wisdom Quotes
title: Wisdom Quotes

api_list.name: Get Wisdom Quote By ID
api_list.description: Returns a single wisdom quote by a given ID. The highest is 27753.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/777"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get A Random Wisdom Quote
api_list.description: Returns a JSON object which includes a random wisdom quote and its related id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/random"

headers = {

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Wisdom Quotes By Page
api_list.description:
Returns an JSON object that includes:

- the page number requested  (current_page), 
- the amount of all pages (max_pages),
- the amount of the quotes (quotes_count) (15 per page),
- the wisdom quotes array (quotes).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/page/12"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/page/{page}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Wisdom Quotes By Topic
api_list.description: Returns an array of all wisdom quotes that are related to a given topic.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/topics/Anger"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/topics/{topic}"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Wisdom Topics
api_list.description:
Returns an Array of all available wisdom topics. 
Each topic has its own quotes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/topics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wisdom-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
